txt.en:
'There are lights in the land, [placeholder]. The fires of Lashkarg burn brightly, for the Khundolar prepare to lay siege to Etheburg. You had a mighty victory at Lashkarg, but now I fear we must pay the price for it.

'Will you stand with us and defend Etheburg? If we can rout the enemy here, then we may actually survive this war!

'If you do wish to help us defend Etheburg, speak with me again, and we will go to prepare ourselves.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo, but can be run with a Duo as well.</rgb>
'Ah, [placeholder], we were fortunate to survive that attack; however, I think the Khundolar will be unable to attack again for some time.\n\n'Thank you for your courage and your weapon!'
'Good! Then let us prepare ourselves for battle!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo, but can be run with a Duo as well.</rgb>

Enraged by your attack upon Lashkarg and the death of their chieftain, the Khundolar stage an assault upon Etheburg.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo, but can be run with a Duo as well.</rgb>
Completed Instance: Lights in the Land
Talk to Céola when you are ready to defend Etheburg

Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.

Céola has asked you to help the Rohirrim border-guard defend against the Khundolar's retaliation.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo, but can be run with a Duo as well.</rgb>
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should speak with Céola regarding the victory at Etheburg.
